features: all with stainlifters Original mighty pacs laundry detergent with the power of 4-in-1 benefits! This laundry stain remover fights tough stains, whitens, brightens, and leaves your clothes smelling clean with a fresh scent!
Fights your family’s toughest stains with this powerful laundry detergent.
Tough on kid stains like mud, grass, and chocolate.
Get a powerful clean with mighty results in one convenient pac per load.

all with stainlifters Original mighty pacs laundry detergent dissolve completely in high efficiency (HE) washing machines and in all water temperatures, including cold water. Safe for septic systems. As always, contains no phosphates.
body.description: Grab a pac of all with stainlifters Original mighty pacs laundry detergent and enjoy the mess. Wanna play? all with stainlifters mighty pacs laundry detergent tackles family-sized messes with a can’t-miss clean. It’s formulated to fight tough stains on all things ooey, gooey, and squishy. all with stainlifters Original mighty pacs laundry detergent’s 4-in-1 cleaning power fight’s your family’s toughest stains whitens, brightens, and leaves your clothes smelling clean with a fresh scent. It is safe to use in any high efficiency (HE) washing machine and it cleans effectively in cold water. all laundry detergent is great for all types of clothes, including activewear. With the 4-in-1 cleaning power of all stainlifters laundry detergent pacs, you don’t have to think twice about jumping in that puddle or slurping that spaghetti. In fact, the messier the better. These detergents were made for putting life before laundry. So, toss an armload of whatever in the washer. You’re all good. This package includes one 75-count tub of all with stainlifters Original mighty pacs laundry detergent, enough for 75 loads of laundry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This laundry soap is a very affordable product for its cost and gives very good results. In addition, it has a considerable amount of pacs and gives a very nice aroma at the end of your wash...it all depends on how much you use...it is that is to say, if your clothes are a little sweaty or dirty, it is advisable to use one more than the amount explained on the packaging.And also give it an extra rinse...this only if the clothes are very dirty, otherwise it is not necessary.I recommend it for its price and its effectiveness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells amazing and fights the dirt
reviews.reviewText: These pods smell amazing and definitely clean soiled clothes. Super inexpensive and the best value there was.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Smelling Pods
reviews.reviewText: These pods are life. The pods would have your clothes smelling very good. I was very surprised at the amount of pods you get for the price. Very affordable and I rack up on these pods when I can. I also like the containers the pods come in. After the pods are done I usually use the container to mix a decent amount of Oxi and scent boosters for my own laundry solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have bought these in the past.they clean well and are a good value for what I paid. Will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Convenient pod that cleans really well and smells fantastic!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best priced detergent that works well in our washer
reviews.reviewText: Best priced detergent that works well in our washer. Happy with it and it is now on my subscribe and save list(which is rather small because I am rather picky). Good product and price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not a strong scent, and convenient because it's easy to use. I usually throw three pods in my Large load to be sure of the cleaning.
